change.text: Moved method setSourceLocation into ICSSSourceLocationAware
Added support for single line comments, starting with "//"
Updated parent-pom version to 23.1
Prepared for Maven central release
The parsing of :not() was changed, so that a list of selectors is parsed
CSSSelectorMemberNot is now holding CSSSelector objects instead of ICSSSelectorMember objects
Made CSSDeclaration mutable
Added default parse exception handler support in CSSReader and CSSReaderDeclarationList
Added new class LoggingCSSParseExceptionHandler
Added default parse error handler support in CSSReaderDeclarationList
Added reading methods in CSSReaderDeclarationList that read directly from an InputStream because this is a one-pass parsing
Renamed class JavaCharStream to CSSCharStream and removed the \uXXXX special handling.
Fixed parsing error when a comment was between @charset and the name
Updated to JavaCC 6.0.1 which gives a huge speedup
Added new methods CSSReader.readFromReader + special overloads for String
Added removeAll... methods to several classes
Fixed reading of CSS files with BOMs; also automatically determining the charset from the BOM if possible
Extended CSSSimpleValueWithUnit to internally use BigDecimal for the numbers
Extended ECSSUnit to support BigDecimal for formatting as well
Added parameter of type Token to ICSSParseErrorHandler.onCSSUnexpectedRule
Updated logging output for unrecoverable errors by using LoggingCSSParseErrorHandler.createLoggingStringParseError
CSSVisitorForUrl was not considering @supports and @viewport rules
Fixed reading CSS with a BOM
In optimized writing of CSS, the last declaration wont get a semicolon
Improved error handling for unexpected rules (e.g. @import in the middle of a file)
Improved error handling in case a closing bracket is missing.
Allowing multiple closing brackets in top-level rules
CSSNodeToDomainObject now throws CSSHandlingException instead of IllegalArgumentException
Explicitly handling invalid selector values like "color:;" - skipping them
Fixed a problem in handling multiple comments within selectors.
Improved API to allow for simpler call chaining when manually creating CSS stuff.
Namespace URLs are now unescaped in CSSNamespaceRule
Allowing CSS 3.0 class names with special names like "and", "or", "from", "to" etc.
Added support for parsing old IE "expression(...)" statements
Improved parsing of unknown CSS rules
Extended MediaQueryTools to support nested media rules.
Improved JavaDocs in many classes
Updated available properties in ECSSProperty and CCSSProperties
Added new concept of ICSSPropertyCustomizer to customize the CSS values of certain properties. This was before hardcoded in AbstractCSSProperties.
Added all missing properties in CCSSProperties
Extended CSSSimpleValueWithUnit API to perform some basic math
Added support for nested @media rules
Made CascadingStyleSheet and all contained classes Serializable
Fixed error in determining the unit of String like "5rem" which was determined as "5em"
Added new methods in ICSSProperty to specify the important flag explicitly
Updated ECSSProperty with the latest properties and add links to the respective specifications for easier handling in the future
Added new enums ECSSSpecification and ECSSSpecificationStatus which lists all W3C CSS specifications
CSSRect now uses the current syntax to emit rectangles (a,b,c,d) instead of (a b c d)
Extended ECSSColor with methods to create CSSRGB, CSSRGBA, CSSHSL and CSSHSLA objects
CSSWriter.getCSSAsString no longer declares to throw an IOException
Made CSSWriter.writeCSS and getCSSAsString more flexible, so that it takes an arbitrary ICSSWriteable
Added support for file footers in CSSWriter
Added support for CSS data URLs in the class CSSURI
Added support for CSS data URLs via the classes CSSDataURL and CSSDataURLHelper
Fixed default CSS properties CCSSProperties.WIDTH_100PERC and CCSSProperties.HEIGHT_100PERC
Fixed the missing semicolon when writing the @charset rule
Added method CSSImportRule.removeAllMediaQueries
Fixed issue that the '\' char was not escaped in CSS URLs
Fixed issue 7: escape/unescape/quoting of CSS URLs improved/fixed
Fixed issue 6: parsing of unicode-range
Fixed invalid color names in ECSSColorName (trailing spaces)
Added support for a custom error handler that handles recoverable errors.
Started adding support for error recovery when parsing some properties fails.
Deprecated DoNothingCSSParseExceptionHandler constructor and added a static getInstance() method instead
Fixed issue 5: comment parsing had an error. Example: div, span /*Comment*/ {}
Fixed NPE when using the CSSVisitorForUrl for CSSDeclarationLists, which actually don't have top-level rules
Allowing 'inherit' and 'initial' as valid values for all properties
Fixed validity check for property "opacity"
Added support for new CSS 3.0 @supports statement
Fixed support for HSL/HSLA color value handling - fixed Hue scaling and saturation + lightness must now be percentage values
Added some methods in classes in com.phloc.css.decl package
Fixed parent element handling in CSSVisitorForUrl
Fixed validity check for property "z-index"
Updated to phloc-commons 4.0.3
Extended CSSMediaList API slightly
Added support for line/column number handling when parsing CSS
Fixed handling of "0" CSS values as numeric values with unit
Removed all deprecated elements
Added new tools class MediaQueryTools for HTML support when referencing a CSS via <link> element
Fixed handling of negation (:not) with namespace prefix
Added test files from CSS3 Selectors Test Suite 1.0 final
Extended CascadingStyleSheet with more query methods (has...Rules and get...RuleCount)
Added missing setting in ICSSWriterSettings to enable/disable writing of viewport rule
Fixed interpretation of namespace prefixes in attribute selectors
Added support for parsing @namespace declarations in CSS 2.1 and 3.0
Added easy way to split a property value like '50%' in the numeric and the unit part (via CSSNumberHelper.getValueWithUnit)
Added new methods to access list members more comfortable
Added support for reading and writing CSS @viewport declarations
Added new constants in CCSSProperties: BORDER_(TOP|RIGHT|BOTTOM|LEFT) and BACKGROUND
Performance improvement by using phloc-commons 3.8.4
Performance improvement by using a cached hash code for DefaultCSSClassProvider objects
Made CSSWriterSettings optimizedOutput flag writable
Added copy-constructor for CSSWriterSettings
Added fix that allows 'to' to be used as an identifier (e.g. in linear-gradient)
Extended CSSExpression API so that building declaration values is more fluent
Added new class AbstractModifyingCSSUrlVisitor
Added method IHasCSSDeclarations.getDeclarationAtIndex
Made all CSSVisitor methods public
Added new class CSSReaderDeclarationList to read a list of declarations only
Added new in-between node "StyleDeclaration" so that it can be read directly (for HTML style attributes)
Moved CSSFilenameHelper from phloc-html into this project
Improved performance when reading CSS with explicit charset definitions by trying to read only the charset first
Added new interface ICSSMultiValue with informational purpose
Extended ECSSUnit with static methods for all units
Extended CSSMediaList API
Added new sanity method CSSExpressionMemberTermURI.getURIString
Added domain objects and utility functions to parse rgb(),rgba(),hsl() and hsla() values
Added domain objects and utility functions to parse rect() values
Moved interface ICSSNamedColor to utils package
Extracted CSSURI class and changed visitor to use this new class
Moved all CSS reading methods from CSSHandler to new class CSSReader
Started support to handle URLs more easily
Added support to quote CSS URL values in writing
Added support for CSS3 calc() functionality
Introduced the enum ECSSMetaUnit to group comparable units
Added 'dppx' unit, removed the 'gd' unit and renamed the 'vm' unit to 'vmin'
Moved CSS value constants from CCSS to CCSSValue
Added better support for handling rect values internally
Added handling for old CSS rectangle syntax 'rect(a b c d)'
Removed all methods from CCSS into more meaningful helper classes
Added new base interface ICSSNamedColor
Moved ECSSProperty to .property package
Removed the content of the .html package
Added possibility to provide a custom exception handler to handle the generated ParseExceptions
Added new writer feature "remove unnecessary code" which removes unnecessary statements
Correctly handling font-face, page and keyframes as child of media rule
CSS 3.0 media list is now optional on @media rule
Added support for "dpi" and "dpcm" CSS units
Added support for simple CSS 2.1 page rule in model
Extended CSSWriter with options to format the output (header?, header text, content charset)
Extracted ICSSWriterSettings interface and using it
Fixed hack in internal handling of complex pseudo selectors (added class CSSSelectorMemberFunctionLike)
Moved all color related elements to a separate subpackage ".color"
Added support for RGBA, HSL and HSLA values
Updated URL visitor API so that the URL is passed in directly
Updated visitor API to handle keyframes rules
Added support for parsing and writing CSS animation rules (CSSKeyframesRule)
Made parsing of IE filters (progid:...) more flexible by adding whitespace support
Moved all HTML relevant things to the new package .html
Added new enum ECSSMediaExpressionFeature
Added support for parsing and writing CSS 3 media queries. Many thanks to Thomas Draier from jahia.com!!!!!
Added CSSHandler.readFromStream with String charset name
Added CSSHandler.isValidCSS method accepting a Reader
Added JavaCharStream constructor
Using a custom CharStream to read CSS files, to ensure that the encoding is used correctly
Changed some return types from returning unmodifiable objects to return copies instead
Added support for explicitly reading and writing CSS with a special charset
Updated to phloc-commons 3.5.0
Fixed cloning of CSSProperty implementations
Enabled compression of simple expression values (like #aabbcc => #abc)
Added modifying methods for CascadingStyleSheet
Added new method isNode in ECSSNodeType for more easier readable code
Fixed bug in grammar concerning spaces before @charset
Moved to Google Code as Open Source
Added new CSS3 and browser specific CSS properties
Added support for border-radius
Fixed bug in parser to read "inherit !important"
Added support for CSSMediaRule in the CSSVisitor
CSS 3.0 parser can now handle negation, nth-* functions, ~ combinator, namespace prefix etc.
Fixed CSS parser speed by using LL(1) by default and LL(k) only on demand
